subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: With Hefner reinjuring his surgically repaired elbow during a rehabilitation start, the Mets were taking a wary approach with the ace Matt Harvey, who also had Tommy John surgery and was rehabbing an elbow as well.
snippet: With Hefner reinjuring his surgically repaired elbow during a rehabilitation start, the Mets were taking a wary approach with the ace Matt Harvey, who also had Tommy John surgery and was rehabbing an elbow as well.
